binding:binding.name: PiHole Binding
binding:binding.description: This is the binding for PiHole.
binding:binding.author: Stefan Wunsch

parameter.name: url
parameter.label: URL
parameter.description: PiHole URL including the protocol, e.g., http://192.168.1.3

parameter.name: token
parameter.label: API token
parameter.description: Token to access the full PiHole web API

parameter.name: refreshInterval
parameter.label: Refresh interval
parameter.description: Interval for refreshing the data in seconds (0=disabled)
